name: Crazy Drift: Rocket Car Z
description:
Crazy Drift: Rocket Car Z is the game you have been waiting for! Who doesn't love the thrill that comes with performing serious stunts? Are YOU ready? Tighten your seat belt and enjoy loads of stunts while driving car! To complete the levels you need to avoid obstacles and master the stunts. Drive at your full speed and you will complete the missions on time. Maneuver with the skills of a pro stunt driver! There is no need to brake due to traffic, or worry about the police chasing you! A crazy yet dangerous adventure lies ahead of you!
Features:
- Variety of Playable Sports Cars
- Amazing Environments
- Extremely Precise Driving Simulator
- Realistic Driving Experience
- Awesome 3D Graphics
- Simple and smooth control
